staff.name: Michelle Ru
staff.bio: Michelle is a senior studying CS + Chemistry with a minor in statistics. She took CS 340 in Fall of 2024 and has been a CA since Spring of 2025. Her favorite MP is UTF-8. Outside of school she likes to bake, watch movies, and hang out with her friends.
